text: @AOC Thats a dangerous inciteful comment that’s speculative and driven by race vs fact. Could one reason be Jamaica station is a hub where it would allow covid19 to spread quicker? Talk lack of healthcare, access to healthy food, education & wealth gap but don’t make this a race issue
